entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
